summary: Seeing garland on the owl slide is something I wanted so bad but didn't think I'd actually get.😭 I'm really glad they took...
body: Seeing garland on the owl slide is something I wanted so bad but didn’t think I’d actually get.😭 I’m really glad they took advantage of all the decorating and festive options in the game. Coupled with the engagement and an ending that left the series open for continuation, this was everything I wanted out of the Christmas episode. Thanks Dan and Phil!

reblog.comment: Seeing garland on the owl slide is something I wanted so bad but didn’t think I’d actually get.😭 I’m really glad they took advantage of all the decorating and festive options in the game. Coupled with the engagement and an ending that left the series open for continuation, this was everything I wanted out of the Christmas episode. Thanks Dan and Phil!

summary: okay listen. i'm emotional and need to rant. let me preface this by saying that of fucking course i respect Dan and Phil's...
body: okay listen. i’m emotional and need to rant. let me preface this by saying that of fucking course i respect Dan and Phil’s decisions in every way. i just realized that i’ve been through a few endings with them and i hate goodbyes. i started watching them less than a year after their last super amazing project video, when it was still uncertain if they were gonna make more sap videos, i was with them for the official end of the super amazing project, i was with them for their last radio show, i was there for small goodbyes like when Dan stopped doing the sexy endscreen dance and guess the crime and when Phil stopped doing his drawing game, and obviously i was there for the more recent endings, for Dan’s rebranding, for their move (which i think was harder for us than it was for them), for the end of the emo hair, i was with them for both of their stage shows and saying goodbye to those when they were over was fucking rough. let me also say that i’m particularly bad with goodbyes and nostalgia will be death of me, so just finding out that this year’s PINOF was their last one and them saying they’re going on a hiatus feels like the end of the world to me. i know it isn’t, and it’ll be fine once i get my shit together. but i am glad i found out about PINOF after it was uploaded cause finding out beforehand would have destroyed me (i get very intense about endings and change) but i’m sad nonetheless. and as far as the hiatus is concerned i’m planning on being cautious. just in case. i’ve experienced a lot of ends of eras with them and i’m just emotional. but i do plan on sticking with them through every future end of an era that might come. above all i want them to be happy and healthy and i’ll support them whatever they’ll ever decide to do. and i hope they’ll return from the hiatus happy and healthy, for whatever comes next.
